SELECT A.id, A.safety_stock, A.current_stock, A.available_stock, CASE WHEN A.current_stock <= 0 THEN 'OUT_OF_STOCK' WHEN A.current_stock < A.safety_stock THEN 'LOW' ELSE 'NORMAL' END AS stock_status, B.id AS warehouse_id, B.name AS warehouse_name, B.type AS warehouse_type, C.id AS material_id, C.name AS material_name, C.material_code, C.spec AS material_spec, C.type AS material_type, C.base_unit AS material_base_unit FROM warehouse_stock A INNER JOIN warehouse B ON A.warehouse_id = B.id INNER JOIN material C ON A.material_id = C.id
AND A.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId}
AND C.type = #{materialType}
AND A.current_stock >= A.safety_stock
AND A.current_stock < A.safety_stock
AND A.current_stock = 0
AND ( C.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR C.material_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR B.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY A.id DESC

SELECT A.id, A.safety_stock, A.current_stock, A.available_stock, CASE WHEN A.current_stock <= 0 THEN 'OUT_OF_STOCK' WHEN A.current_stock < A.safety_stock THEN 'LOW' ELSE 'NORMAL' END AS stock_status, B.id AS warehouse_id, B.name AS warehouse_name, B.address AS warehouse_address, B.type AS warehouse_type, C.id AS material_id, C.name AS material_name, C.material_code, C.spec AS material_spec, C.type AS material_type, C.base_unit AS material_base_unit, C.unit_price AS material_unit_price FROM warehouse_stock A INNER JOIN warehouse B ON A.warehouse_id = B.id INNER JOIN material C ON A.material_id = C.id WHERE A.id = #{id}
